items.title: Rebels kill DR Congo governor as fighting intensifies - reports
items.description: Conflict in eastern DR Congo's has forced 400,000 people to flee their homes this year alone, the UN says.

items.title: Hamas names next Israeli hostages set to be released
items.description: Four are due to be freed in a second exchange of hostages for Palestinian prisoners held in Israel.

items.title: Pakistan Youtuber ordered to make welfare videos for owning lion
items.description: Court orders Rajab Butt to produce one video a month for a year after he was given cub as wedding gift.

items.title: Judge rejects US mother's extradition challenge
items.description: Kimberlee Singler is wanted in Colorado to face a seven-count indictment - including first-degree murder.

items.title: Ukraine claims drone strike on Russian oil refinery
items.description: Russia says it shot down more than 120 drones overnight, in what would be one of the largest attacks of the war.
